ee wage gilihi yana ape sanskruthiya aagama ee wagema game rate sanwardhanayata uparimaya sahayogaya laba di katayuthu karannath idiriyedi pawathwena palath sabhawatath parlimenthu mathiwaranawalatath idiripath wima thamayi mage ekama balaporoththuwa” rahe eki sabeta giya eka gana nayakala aththo thutin henanigala gammanaye aadiwasi nayaka uuruwarigaye gunabanda nawa manthriwariyage sathuta bhukthi widimata age niwasata pamina me athara, henanigala gammanaye aadiwasi nayaka uuruwarigaye gunabanda kiya sitiye "mama kiyanne rahe aththange sahayogayen path wu aya rahe aththange hith dinagena rahe aththanage gatalu prashnawalata madihath wi eewa wisadanawa wagema idiriye di game witharak neweyi palathe wage rate prashnath wisadanna puewan thanakata yanna wasanawa labewa kiyana gaman mage hithata loku sathutak danenawa rahe ekiyak manthriwariyak wima pilibada rahe unta loku aadambarayak bawayi.
